remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性为 对象中显示的值指定自定义的显示格式。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果未设置 属性，则将显示字段的值而不进行任何特殊格式设置。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. > [!NOTE] > 在早于3.5 的 ASP.NET 版本中，必须将 属性设置为 `false`，才能设置不是字符串数据类型的字段的格式。In versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5, you must set the property to `false` in order to format fields that are not string data types. 否则，在应用 属性中存储的格式字符串之前，该字段值将按默认转换方法转换为字符串。Otherwise, the field value is converted to a string by the default conversion method before the format string that is stored in the property is applied. 默认情况下，仅当包含 对象的数据绑定控件处于只读模式时，才会将格式设置字符串应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要在编辑模式下将格式设置字符串应用于字段值，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To apply the formatting string to field values while in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 格式字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段值的占位符。The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式设置字符串 `Item Value: {0}`中，当字符串显示在 对象中时，字段的值将替换 {0} 占位符。For example, in the formatting string `Item Value: {0}`, the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the object. 格式字符串的其余部分显示为文本文本。The rest of the formatting string is displayed as literal text. 如果格式设置字符串不包含占位符，则最终显示文本中只包含格式设置字符串本身（数据源中不包含该字段的值）。If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, only the formatting string itself is included in the final display text (the field's value from the data source is not included). 如果占位符是括在大括号中的一个0（零），如前面的示例所示，则字段值通过默认方法转换为字符串。If the placeholder is a 0 (zero) enclosed in curly braces as shown in the preceding example, the field value is converted to a string by the default method. 您可以将一个字符串追加到零，该字符串指定如何设置字段值的格式。You can append to the zero a string that specifies how the field value should be one of a series of values the placeholder should use. 由于每个单元格中只有一个字段值，因此，左大括号后面的数字只能设置为0。Because there is only one field value in each cell, the number that follows the left curly brace can only be
